title: The Complete Do-it-Yourself Manual (Newly Updated)
description:
The Complete Do-it-Yourself Manual (Newly Updated) by Editors Of Family Handyman

English | 2014 | ISBN: 1621452018 | 528 pages | EPUB | 148 MB

The leading manual for home improvements is getting an update to address current codes, latest materials, tools and technology.
The bestselling, most comprehensive guide to home improvements has been revised and updated once again since it's revision in 2005.
